title: Keen 5 help
content:
Hi[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

I was playing keen 5 and have reached the end of the game but I cant destroy the last glass machine thing.

Could anybody please help me?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke.gif[/img]

Thanks

Phil

title: Re: Keen 5 help
content: Here's a hint: get one of those "floating TV"-like mines near to the fuse (the glass ball) and run away very fast.
